snippet: Jon M. Huntsman Jr., the former governor of Utah, is counting on a surge of support from late-breaking voters.
abstract: Jon M. Huntsman Jr., the former governor of Utah, is counting on a surge of support from late-breaking voters.
lead_paragraph: HAMPSTEAD, N.H. - For Al Sandler, an independent voter here, Jon M. Huntsman Jr.'s performance in Sunday's presidential debate was the clincher. When Mr. Huntsman said that Mitt Romney was wrong to criticize him for being President Obama's ambassador to China, adding, "The nation is divided because of attitudes like that," it was music to Mr. Sandler's ears.
